attributes.action: Evaluate the use of 4x4 before increasing Road Tax
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The Government are considering raising Road Tax on 4x4's across the country in the budget. This will obviously have a detrimental effect on most farmers and the rural community who use their 4x4's correctly. i.e Towing vehicle, off road, small holding, etc. as opposed to the Chelsea Tractor drivers. A proof of use should be submitted so that the Tax can be fairly collected. There is also the problem of selling/trading in a 4x4, how does the Government intend to deal with this problem. Please add your name to this petition.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
